title: Ranked Banning
body: Over these few weeks my "team mates" have constantly banned the champions I picked to show I wanted to play them but they ban them anyways.Can we implement a system to stop your own team mates from banning the champs you want to? If not can we at least get them a small punishment straight up for doing so?

replies.body:
[Tactical disagreements aren't punishable,](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752884-Reporting-a-Player#h2q1) so if you are trying to play Zed or Malz or someone who is frequently banned for good reason then it isn't considered "unsportsmanlike behaviour". 

With that said, if you are picking say Syndra mid, and they ban it, best to ask them why just to confirm it wasn't for a valid reason. Obviously if they say something like "because your Syndra winrate is trash" then that's reportable.

Basically what it comes down to is "was there a valid reason to ban that champion". If the answer is yes, or you think it's no but they give you a valid answer then it isn't punishable. If the answer is no then you can report it under "unsportsmanlike behaviour" in post game, or submit a support ticket with screenies if you don't make it that far.

If you're unsure about what a valid reason would be, feel free to post a client screenie here and we can discuss why the champ you intent picked might be banned, _**just be aware that the boards has a no name and shame policy**_ so you should black out the summ names before you do something like that.
kk I'll keep this in mind for next time it happens
